manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Lapurifier specializes in HEPA air purifier, small car air purifier, and other innovative environmental home appliances. We aim to create more comfortable living condition for every customer. Freely and healthy breath with you. Enjoy fresh air with the Lapurifier Car Air Purifier. Use Anion technology release 12 Million PCS/cm³negative ion to remove pollen, dust mites, smoke, and other tiny airborne particles. Ultra-strong turbo fan refreshes the air of the whole car in 10 mins. No ozone. 2 speeds of fan Noise less than 27 dB 10mins rapid air refresh Anion removal technology No filter needed, cut cost. Perfect for car, home and office Al Alloy+ABS construction anti-fingerprint and fall resistant

Easy to used One button operation, easy to use. Insert the purifier, it will auto-work when the car starts. USB output for charging Our car purifier offers an extra USB port for charging your mobile devices without occupying the car port. Strong turbo fan High speed to purify up to 108 sq. ft, low speed to save energy and create a peaceful environment.

Runs quiet Runs at a nearly silent 30dB, create a peaceful environment without disturbing you. High-efficiently purification Release millions of anion catches 99.97% of airborne particles as small as 0.3 Microns. Ideal gift for your loved one This mini air purifier is an ideal gift. It is exquisite design and well-made, three different colors can satisfy your preference.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product, reasonable price!
reviews.reviewText: Working perfectly! Effective odor elimination for small car. However, noise level can be improved.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great in my small car, struggles a bit in an SUV
reviews.reviewText: Got this to help with air purification in my car. I drive a small car that already has a good cabin air filter, but wanted a little extra. Once I received it, I got it out and set it up in my car. Within about 5 minutes I couldn't smell any of the outside smells (it was summer so there were plenty). it's a bit noisy if the stereo is turned all the way down but or my purposes it was fine.Where it really shines is on long drives. My commute is half an hour every day and I honestly think I'm breathing easier by the time I get home or get to work. Once when I was driving home I drove through a construction zone and wondered how it smelled. Yes weird but I noticed I wasn't smelling anything even through they were laying asphalt. So the next day I checked by cracking a window as I passed through the zone. Sure enough, hot oil smell.So the fact that it kept that smell down in my car is good enough for me. Having a pass through USB port just makes it that much handier.4 stars only because I'm not seeing nearly the same effect in my wife's SUV, but it's got a cabin almost 3 times the size of my car, and my car is probably sealed up better. So it struggles in a bigger vehicle, but I can still tell it's having an effect on odors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Bad blower fans all over the place
reviews.reviewText: EDIT New.The machine finally died. Guess what part died? The fan. Being a tech, I tore the unit apart to see how it was made. Considering the makers were chinese, I bow to you. This was made with the most respect and skill. I haven't seen anything from China made this well in a very long time.I advise the manufacturer to sue the fan manufacturer because that company that made the crap fans, destroyed an entire industry. You can not find these things anymore. Last year there were hundreds of these products by multiple manufacturers. They went out of business because of the company that produced the fans. The fans failed and it made the products look like they were junk. This was a product when I took it apart, looked like it was made by Sony back in the 1980's. Skill, quality and respect. I bow to you, I truly do. What you made is a masterpiece.Take that fan company to court and sue them.Old reviewI want a Negative Ion machine, I buy five different ones from five different companies and they all died within two months.This one from this company, I purchased one of these and received it on September 15th. Today is October 24 and its already dead.When you make a product, you don't make everything. You buy parts that are made by other companies. Table fan for example. Table fan company makes the fan, but they buy the switches, buttons, and motors from other companies that makes those things. It's not the fan companies fault if the buttons break or the motors are bad. (unless they keep using those faulty products by those cheap companies.)Back on track. Ive purchased six of these things this year by five different manufacturers. Including this unit by this company. All but one have broken and the exact same part failed on all of them. The little blower fan. This tells me that there is a company out there that is selling these Negative Ion companies really crappy fans. The sad part is that it is making the entire industry look bad. I want a Negative Ion maching, I buy five from five different companies and they all died within two months.Ive been reading a lot of reviews all over Amazon about products from multiple types of devices all having failures due to faulty tiny fans. So somethings going on.

reviews.reviewerName: Avoid these lighters like the rip off they are. They are overpriced, made to last only a week and then they break. Stick with decent brands likes Zico. Scorch is a SCAM!
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Does not let you change filter. Its is a use and throw away product. Probably made by boomers and the poop(I would use other forms of this word) cloned from boomers who think they are special. Only these two generations could invent something so wasteful. Like automatic flushers wasting water and spreading germs. These are beyond just things we can do with out, these are things we need to actively get rid of.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Small and quiet
reviews.reviewText: It’s probably very nice for a small area. Would be perfect for use in a car; but it has to be unplugged to turn it off. Not sure if that is by design, or if the switch doesn’t work, but I’ll be returning it and looking for a different one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought it for my car because I don’t like inhaling pollution, while I’m driving. It makes such a huge difference.!!! The air is amazingly clean, and so easy to breathe! So I bought the same one for my bedroom and it works perfectly. In fact, I have another air purifier where I need to wash filters, and I’ve noticed that since I’m using this little device, my other air purifier never gets dirty at all! I used to wash it every month and it was dark water coming out of it. Since I started using this little device, my other filter is always clean, but I still use both just in case. I’m going to buy another unit for my living room. I live next to construction in the building so I run air purifiers nonstop . so far this little device works perfectly for my car and for my bedroom. Such a difference in the quality of the air when I’m running it. highly recommend.!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for bed room
reviews.reviewText: I use this for my room and it’s perfect. Makes my room smell like nothing which is perfect. After a few days I truly feel like I’m sleeping and breathing better because of it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars No battery? Still giving it 5 stars!
reviews.reviewText: So ive used an hepa air purifier for about a year, it does ... clean the air from odors, smoke and dust,But: this ionizer provides a 'out sidish' kind of airNot only the odors and smoke are gone, but you feel as if you opened a window even in a close days in your car or at your window less office... its amazing, and you dont have to spend money on filters for about 5 years!Whats not to like... that it have no batteries? But you still have the ability to charge your device via the usb port and you still can operate the product via power banks...impressive!At the few first minutes of use on a dirty air, it produces some noises... but nothing more than 3 minutes... nothing to be worried about.Edit: after several months the air purification IONs is too much and only if i open all 4 windows for 15 minutes, i start to smell the natural seat's leather and perfume.. Something is weird in the air its produces. Its feels like it's not gonna fade away soon from the environment. I'm stopping the use of it.
Only worked for 3 weeks. Tried every fix and it won't turn on. Was very happy with it until this happened

I use this unit in a car.I only drive the car on weekends.The unit was working fine in the first 5 weeks.After that, the fan noise became louder that I had to turn it off.I was going to return the unit but it passed the returned window.So if anyone considers buying this product, this is a risk. So be aware.I saw a similar post before I bought the unit, but I thought it might be a once off but it is not.
